price: Òun ni Allāhu, kò sí ọlọ́hun kan tí a gbọ́dọ̀ jọ́sìn fún ní ọ̀nà òdodo àyàfi Òun, Onímọ̀ ìkọ̀kọ̀ àti gban̄gba. Òun ni Àjọkẹ́-ayé, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
